1.content:
It was a beautiful day out, the birds were chirping, and the sun was shining. What better to do for these 6 young girls than to go to their local carnival. All 6 of these teenagers have decided to meet up at the carnival. These teens include; Emily , a 5" 9' fun filled girl with size 7 feet. She is wearing leggings, a tank top and a pair of toms with socks on. Jenna, a 5"8' weird funny girl with size 6 feet. She is wearing shorts with a baggy t shirt and socks with sandals. Tess, Jenna's twin sister who can be a bit arrogant and stubborn. She is 5" 8' and has size 7 feet. She is wearing jeans with a tight t shirt and a pair of converse. Brenna, a drama filled girl who seems to have more enemies then friends, who is also 5" 6' and has size 5 feet. She is wearing tights, toms and a baggy long sleeve shirt. Grace, who is a bit of a drama queen herself and has firey red hair. She is constantly saying that she isn't ticklish which everyone knows isn't true. She is 5" 5' and has size 4 feet. She is wearing sweatpants, basketball sneakers and a tight tank top. And finally there is Jaedyn, a tall fun girl who seems to always be smiling. She is about 5"11' and has size 10 feet. She is wearing tights, toms and a long sleeve shirt.
They all head in to the carnival where they are instantly attracted to the biggest thing there. "The Laughing Box" all the girls eagerly approach and get in line. After what seemed like an eternity, the girls get to the front of the line where a sign reads, " no shoes, socks, or loose clothing inside." Lucky for the girls with baggy clothes on, they had tank tops on underneath to wear inside. A man took their clothing and footwear that they quickly stripped off their bodies and he put them on a conveyer belt which seemed to lead to the end of the area. As they enter, they are greeted by man who is getting them situated. They see a roller coaster come to a hault right in front of them. The man instructs them to get in.

Who's perspective will you read from?
1.title: The beginning

11.content: After stripping off your shoes and socks. You are then guided to the first Cart in this roller coaster. It took you so by surprise that there was a roller coaster in the first place. You take your seat in the cart and get strapped In, when all of a sudden the floor opens causing your feet to fall through it, it then closes back up trapping your ankles and feet underneath the cart. Now your feet are dangling there. "What the heck is going on" you say as you start to wonder. The coaster has already begun to move, you look to your side at jenna who you are sitting in the same cart as. She seems to be a bit worried as well. The coaster goes up a small hill and sends them back down with great speed, nothing seems to have happened yet. But then ....
11.title: Emily

111.content: As the coaster is set to go up another hill, feathers Pop out underneath the coaster and in the tracks. They start to move rapidly and come closer to your feet. You have extremely ticklish feet, it's by far your worst spot. The feathers start stroking your now bare sole quickly up and down. Hahahaha, you laugh as the feathers touch your feet. " oh mahaha goahahahshh noahah" as the coaster reaches the top it goes down the hill with great speed causing the feathers to touch your soles much quicker causing more ticklish reaction. Hahahaha whahahaht is going onahahaha stahpphaha" the cart goes on a loop and seems to stop in the middle of it causing the people in the coaster to be suspended upside down. The feathers continue to tickle your feet which is making you die of laughter when all of a sudden...
111.title: feathers pop out

choices: the coaster begins to move again
1111.content:
2 mechanical hands erupt from the coaster and slowly come to a stop but your dangling arms. It spreads its fingers and starts to tickle your under arms. You try so desperately to close your arms to your sides but the weight of gravity is too much. Your stuck there to laugh as the hands poke and prod in your armpits. Hahahahaah whahahaht
You start.to think that the tockling is too much with the hands in your armpits and the feathers on your crazy ticklish size 7 feet.
Then ..
1111.title: 2 robot hands come out

11111.content:
The coaster starts to move again causing an eruption of laughter until it finally stops. Panting you are directed off of the coaster, you as well as the other girls finally think it's over but the fun has just begun .
You are directed to two doors in front of you. One reads " maze 1" the other reads "maze 2"
Which door do you enter.
11111.title: the coaster begins to move again

111111.content:
You decide to enter the door that reads maze 1. You start to walk a bit and take in the scenery as the maze looks beautiful. It looks like a rain forest with wet trees and bushes and the grass is moist and amazing. You start to wonder how this first in the one tent in the carnival but you disregard it. You begin to walk forward, taking turn after turn not quite knowing where your going. You reach a dead end and have o turn around, just when you go to turn around the grass seems to start moving quickly under your feet.
You giggle a bit as you realize the grass is tickling you, you don't think much of it aside from a few giggles here and there until the grass starts moving a lot faster. Now it's really starting to tickle as you start hopping on either foot trying to avoid it while laughing like mad. Hahahaha hoahaahw is thiiiahahahahs hapennninhhahah.
Soon you fall to your knees from laughter and you don't know quite how to make your way forward. You start to crawl , but the grass doesn't tickle your legs because of your leggings. Then the grass seems to stop moving. You take a sigh of relief and push forward.you start to hug the wall as a strategy to get to the end. You begin to run when...
111111.title: maze 1

choices: The lock at the thighs startst to tickle there
It stops and does not continue
They see a switch point move. New path is into a black hole
12.content:
The roller coaster car offered four rows of two fluffy seats each. Grumbling Jenna sees Brenna take the seat next to her. She did not like Brenna very much due to her bragging and her usual claimings to be best of them or being treated unfairly. Jenna sighed and got strapped in. She had tied her baggy t-shirt and now struggled to prevent the bulky end of the t-shirt from blocking the security systems of the car. The girl was surprised that not only shoulder pads and a strap over her hips kept her firmly pressed into the seat. Also two firm locks were fixed over her thighs just above her knees, which were much bulkier than Jenna thought would be required. In the last row two girls were sitting which none of them knew.

Finally the roller coaster car started to move, albeit slowly. After a few feet suddenly the girls felt a rush of air on their bare feet when the part of the floor of the car where they rested their feet slipped to the sides. First the girls only shrieked and giggled when their feet were dangling in the air. But a gasp of shock followed by silly laughter from the first row made the girls behind go silent. Row by row the girls now felt that their soles and insteps were now dragged over an endless row of soft bristles, forcing gales of laughter from the girls when the car continued to move slowly up the steep hill. At the apex the car stopped. The girls looked towards the almost vertical descent and gasped in excitement. It came to Jenna's mind how horribly it would tickle if the car was rushing down the hill over the bristles. She groaned and wrestled in her seat to move her feet away from the bristles, but no avail.

A clock counted down from 10, increasing the tension. But when it reached five everything changed. Each girl felt something poking her ribs, making them frantically reach down with their hands to remove the little mechanical finger tips that came out from the sides of their seats. But the girls were too tightly strapped to their seats. With screams of laughter and shouts for help the clock ticked down to zero. A collective scream of fear and tickle torture erupted from eight mouths. The merciless scratching of the bristles over the poor feet increased to a fully blown attack when the car picked up speed and rushed down the steep rail. Jenna's t-shirt offered little protection of her ribs. While the fingers there did not hurt her they seemed to know well how to extract most of the tickle shocks.

When the first bends were passed an the car slowed to down to climb up the second and smaller hill the fingers retracted. A collective breathe was audible. Jenna turned to Brenna to say "this was horrible but fun" she was surprised to see teardrops in Brenna's eyes. Her neighbor only nodded. When the car reached the apex of the smaller hill the girls were shocked to see another clock tick down from 10. When it reached five...
12.title: Jenna

choices: Can't Take it. Tess Passes Out!
Tess Makes It till the end
The Roller Coaster Goes to a tunnel
13.content:
Tess is an arrogant girl, she is stubborn, she likes to complain and is the exact same opposite of her sister Jenna.

"This is a stupid idea. I Hate Trains! And whats with the rules? isn't this supposed to be fun?" Tess Protested.
"Aw come on sis! Trains don't bite! Come its going be fun just try it" Her sister Jenna insisted on. "Okay fine! But i get to pick our seats."Tess retorted.

As they approach the seats they noticed two holes on the floor of each seats.
"Hey Mister! whats the Holes for?" Complained Tess.
"You put your feet on the holes." says by the suspicious man.
"What are they for?" Grace asked.
"You'll have to try it for you to know." the man replies with a grin on his face. "All Aboard!"
The girls sat on their seats placing their ankles on the holes, the holes tightened holding their feet in place an the ride started moving.
The Coaster went up and reached the peak. "This is really weird my feet are cold i and feel exposed" Tess complained.
"Hey whats that?" Emily asked pointing at the white part of the roller coaster track.

Little do they know that those were white fluffy soft feathers waiting to torment their trapped feet.
The Roller Coaster was fast approaching. And Sooner the feathers made their first contact.
The Feathers danced across their defenseless soles stroking every area of their feet.

"Eppp" "ahehaehehea" "whwhahahahahat?" the girls screamed in confusion.
Tess tried to pull her feet out but it was no use since the holes had tightened their grip making it useless.
Tess now knew what the white tracks were. And all she wants was to get out of the ride.
"hyeahahahaha" Tess felt the feathers sliding everywhere.
The feathers were moving bellow her arches, tracing her soles and brushing in between her toes leaving almost nothing untouched.

"Ahahat leheheast ihihiht cahahant gehehet annehehe wohohorse" Brenna exclaimed.
Then it stopped. The coaster was slowing down and the tracks right now seem safe and everyone was given a chance to catch their breath.
But a new sight caught their eyes, big green brushy tracks can be seen on the next place their heading.
"Oh no. No no no no you just had to talk!" Tess cried.
The Coaster was moving toward the green brushes and it soon came contact.
The Coaster was moving but slightly slower then before the girls who were getting use the the fast speed faced a new trial.
Slow soft brushes coated in slippery substance are now brushing their feet. Ever so slowly doings so and tickling while hyper sensitizing their feet even more.

The Coaster goes on alternation with fast fluffy feathers and slow soft tickly green brushes.
13.title: Tess

14.content:
You are directed to the cart of a roller coaster as you begin to be confused. "Why are we riding a roller coaster" I hate roller coasters" you exclaim as the others tell you to shut up and get in. As you get in and get strapped up, the floor opens up swallowing your size 5 bare sole sand clamping down on your ankles trapping them. "What the hell, I can't move my ankles" what is this all about " the man that directed you then responds with, you'll see. As the coaster begins to move. It goes up a very large hill and shoots down it with great speed causing a ton of screaming. Then all of a sudden a bunch of feather pop out from the tracks right below your bare soles. Of course you don't know this but you do in a few seconds as the feathers move up an inch and start rapidly moving back and forth. "What the heckhahah mmmmf " you say as you try to hold in your laughter but as everyone on the coaster begins to laugh it seems, you can't hold it in anymore hahahahahahaha ohhhh mahaha gohahahs

You have never been tockled on your feet by feathers before, sure your brother has tickled you there but never with anything but fingers. It tickled you so bad, you were left there gaspingm for air in between your gut wrenching laughter, when all of a sudden the coaster seems to stop on a loop, holding you suspended upside down. Your arms hanging above your head. "What is going onahahaha as the feathers continue to tickle your feet. But then ...
14.title: Brenna

141.content:
You are still dangling upside-down next to Tess, both of you having your feet incessantly stroked by feather tips while you both cackle with laughter. Glancing over at her, you see that she too is laughing and smiling, but you wonder if she is also secretly feeling as panicked and terrified as you! Will this whole ride be as exasperating as this?!?

         Suddenly, you are both sent into another conniption of terrified screams when a beach-ball-sized bulbous clownish head suddenly comes accordianing down right between you and Tess’s seats, as if it is looking down at the two of you from the darkness above. You and Tess both shriek in unison at the surprise, and go into an even worse tantrum when it says in a laughing, goofy-sounding recorded voice: Welcome to The Laughing Box! Aren’t we having FUN? Ha!Ha!Ha! Yes you ARE! LaughLaughLaugh for us! Oochie, goochie-goo!”, while robotic cartoonish hands suddenly sprout out from somewhere behind your seat-backs, a pair for the two of you, and begin their coordinated tickling and stroking attacks!

         You are screaming bloody murder, but still look like you are laughing and having a good time to the girls in the other cars, who are laughing and egging the creepy clownish mechanoid on to continue tickling you! Your head is pounding from all the blood rushing to it, and you are sent into renewed hysterics when you feel the hands getting a little too touchy-feely for comfort, insinuating their way under your tight top and even into your stretchy leggings!

         You want to scream out, “MAKE IT STOP!”, but you are too flabbergasted with every new sensation as your hands try to fend off the snakelike appendages assaulting your body. The hands eventually leave-off from their fondling all over your torso to take a turn at some fingertip sole-tickling! You are literally crying with laughter and nearly out of breath! You feel like you are about to faint while all the other girls seem oblivious to your desperation!

         Just as you think you can’t take any more of this treatment, the carnival car abruptly rights itself, slamming you back against the cushy backs again, and a metal rail locks into place right in front of both you and your ride-partner Tess’s tummies. While the car slides back into action on the rails, the scary bobbing clown-head calls out: “That was fun, wasn’t it? Now on to more excitement inside The Tickle Box! Bye girls! Ta-Ta!”, and the car again picks up speed inside the pitch dark ride, sending you and Tess hurtling forward on into the twisting and turning, up, down, and around ride.

         You seem to be handling this traditional thrill-ride part better than Tess, who looks a tad blanched as you careen down the track. Perhaps because you are so thankful that the tickling has subsided. Trying to yell over the loud music and laughter inside the ride, “I think I just got groped by a robot, Tess!”

         “Me too Brenna! This isn’t at ALL like I thought this ride would be!”, she yells back in her tiny voice over the loudspeakers inside the ride, as the both of you round a bend in the dark tunnel, and suddenly the car stops in it’s tracks again, and the girl’s seat suddenly folds out so that their legs are now trapped-in-place facing straight in front of them.
141.title: Tickled by Robotic Hands!

142.content:
Through all the laughter you feel something poking you, as you turn you see that the redhead grave is poking your underarms. You start to wonder how she is lifting her arms up in the air but all you can do is giggle as she tickles your armpits. Hahahaha grace staahahahap.
"This is for starting so much drama all the time."
"Grace pleeaeaassssee hahahahahahah ooohhhhwhaha
Grace continues to poke and prod at your armpits, which is tickling you so much it's crazy. You can't believe that she is doing this to you but all you can do is laugh. You can't lift your arms up to defend yourself. Hahahah you continue to laugh until...
142.title: you feel someone  poke you

15.content: here are the other two !
15.title: More

info.brief_description: 6 teenage girls go to the carnival to have some fun, but end up having more then expected.
info.description:
